Index of /public/ftp/pub/Linux/system/admin/su

What you'll find here: utilities to allow selected users to run root programs

You can also view this index in terse format, or return to the parent directory.

root1.2.tar.gz (LSM entry) 15Ap97
a clone of sudo that allows temporary root to users in subscription file (9570 bytes)
su1-4.2.tgz (LSM entry) 15Dec97
allows selected users to run root programs (25260 bytes)
sudo-1.2-shadow.tgz (LSM entry) 11Mar95
lets users run commands as root w/ shadow support (26761 bytes)
super-3.7.2.linux.tar.gz (LSM entry) 30Aug95
suid program that restricts access to suid programs (78293 bytes)
usershutdown-1.1.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1Jan98
allows selected users, controlled by a file in /etc, to shut down the system (2565 bytes)
